description:
Kululu becomes a really popular idol.  He takes advantage of it to be even more of a jerk than ever.  And then Keroro decides the platoon needs to return to their roots as invaders... by acting like stereotype villains, complete with costume changes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kururu, Kururun Idol Legend / Keroro, Resetting My Mind!
クルル クルルンアイドル伝説 / ケロロ 初心に帰る!
